# Draft:Star Awards for Best Radio Programme

}}
Best Radio Programme
Award Details
Presented for: Outstanding achievement in radio programming
Country: Singapore
First awarded: 2021
Most recent winner:  The Shuang, Kunz, Jia Trio 双节坤佳 (YES 933)
Most awards: The Breakfast Quartet 早安！玉建煌崇 (LOVE 972) (4)
Best Radio Programme is an accolade awarded to outstanding radio shows that demonstrate excellence in content, creativity, listener engagement, and overall production quality. It is presented at the Star Awards in Singapore to honor the most popular and impactful radio programmes each year.
History
The Best Radio Programme award was first introduced in 2020 at the Star Awards in Singapore. The award recognizes radio shows that have excelled in connecting with audiences through creative segments, informative content, and unique presentation styles. It highlights the importance of radio as a vital medium in the modern entertainment landscape.
Past Winners and Nominees
2021
Winner: The Breakfast Quartet 早安！玉建煌崇 (LOVE 972)
Nominees:
Mr Zhou's Ghosts Stories 周公讲鬼 (LOVE 972)
Little City, Big Matters 小城大事 (CAPITAL 958)
The Night is Young YEAH夜不打烊 (YES 933)
The DAKA Show 大咖一起来 (YES 933)
2022
Winner: The Breakfast Quartet 早安！玉建煌崇 (LOVE 972)
Nominees:
Mr Zhou's Ghosts Stories 周公讲鬼 (LOVE 972)
The Shuang & Kunz Show 双节坤 (YES 933)

The DAKA Show 大咖一起来 (YES 933)

The DAKA Show 大咖一起来 (YES 933)
Significance
Winning the Best Radio Programme award is regarded as a prestigious honor that highlights a show's creativity and connection with the audience. It helps strengthen a programme's brand and often leads to greater popularity and recognition for the presenters involved.
